TopicTitle: Tech tree not displayed after save transfer

Articles.Content: Currently running the save on a clean 1.0.2 install, save is from a modded 1.0 install. Mods installed were, Kerbal Engineer Redux, StageRecovery, Kerbal Alarm Clock, and Thermometer. I copied the save file to the new folder and ran the game, tech tree, in the old save, would not show up in the R&D facility. I am running Ubuntu, and use the 64 bit version of KSP. Any help would be appreciated.

Having the same issue here! Gonna go nuts.. But on windows https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12199776/persistent.sfs any help would be great thanks.. I would hate to start new. Also when constructing ships they just stick to the floor? I haven't seen anyone else with the same issue yet!

Thanks in advance Damack.!

I have the exact same issue - no tech tree, ships just sticking to the floor.... Any fixes?

Mac, Kerbal 1.0.3

Think i figured it out - at least it fixed everything for me. The key is to move all the files in GameData called ModuleManager.#### into your new gameData directory as well as the other mods. (I only moved the subfolders before, e.g. KIS, Mechjeb2, etc)

Additionally, I moved my save game folder out of the Kerbal directory, deleted and re-installed the game, but I think the above was the step i was missing, since that didn't work by itself.

Incidentally, this all happened after migrating to 1.0.3 from 1.0.2
